titleInfo.title: Mel Tillis at Shoal Creek Country Music Park

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on yellow) announcing Grand Ole Opry stars Mel Tillis and the Statesiders with Bob Luman at the Shoal Creek Country Music Park on June 13. Poster features metal photoplates of Mel Tillis and Bob Luman.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
